headline: Talent Shortage Concerns Drive Shift to Skills-Based Strategies, Workday Research Finds
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY), the AI platform for managing people and money, today released "The Global State of Skills", revealing a pressing challenge for businesses worldwide: More than half (51%) of business leaders are worried about future talent shortages, and only 32% are confident their organization has the skills needed for long-term success.
